title: This font is awesome. Does anyone know what it is?
content:
I love this logo for Brooklyn Tacos. I'm in the middle of a project and I think this font would be perfect for it. I just have no idea what it is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071032im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brooklyntaco-dd_5275.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [brooklyntaco-dd.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071032/http:/typophile.com/files/brooklyntaco-dd.jpg) | 46 KB |
author: AmyU

comments.content:
hm. version from their menu is slightly different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071032im_/http:/typophile.com/files/snap_6675.png)
you can always ask the designers at [Tag Collective](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071032/http:/tag-collective.com/). they might be kind enough to hint at their process.
Yeah, I think I'm going to do that.
